titles.home: Agricontrol — Your new standard for field management

meta.description: Agricontrol is the easiest way to never lose track. Keep a cool head and concentrate on what's important.

header.hero: A man in a John Deere tractor
header.heading: Your new standard field management solution
header.paragraph: Agricontrol helps you never lose the overview. It makes it unbelievably easy to manage your fields and crops. So that you have more time for the important things.

advantages.heading: Your advantage
advantages.paragraph: With Agricontrol you can manage your fields and activities wherever you are. The application is available on your smartphone and you can record new activities directly on the tractor. You don't have to spend a lot of time on filling out papers anymore. And at the end of the year, you can easily create an export for your controller in just a few clicks.
advantages.image: A man in a Massey Fergusson tractor

functionality.heading: How it works

paragraphs.first: Agricontrol is an application that makes field management easier for you. On your computer as well as on your smartphone, you can add and change fields, crops and activities within a very short amount of time.
paragraphs.second: With a login to Agricontrol you can add your fields and then easily create your crops on it. Agricontrol will draw your attention to the fact that a newly recorded crop does not respect the rules of crop rotation defined in your account and will display your fields and crops in an easy-to-read manner. You have your own lists in which you can record your machines, fertilisers and pesticides, soil cultivation measures and diseases. Once entered, these are available to you if you want to create new activities or edit existing ones with just a few clicks on the respective crops.

whatsToCome.heading: What's to come
whatsToCome.image: Man in combine harvester on a wheat field
whatsToCome.paragraph: We are working tirelessly on improving and simplifying field management for you with Agricontrol. That's why we continue to develop our product. In addition to constantly refining the tool, we are currently working on developing new functionalities. In just a few months you will be able to record all activities such as fertilisation, soil cultivation and plant protection in Agricontrol. This can then be automatically prepared as a field sheet and exported.

paragraphs.first: Agricontrol arose out of the need to be able to offer farmers in Switzerland a modern way of field management independent of location and equipment.
paragraphs.second: Thanks to the support and experience of Informatio Ltd., we were able to pursue this idea and develop a concept with all our heart and soul. The result is a product that meets current customer needs and is well positioned for the future.
paragraphs.third: Fields, cultures and activities can be recorded and processed flexibly on the computer as well as on the smartphone within a very short time. Tedious paperwork becomes a thing of the past and eventually, a complete report can be created and printed out within just a few clicks.
paragraphs.fourth: We—Robin Löffel, Lukas Kocherhans, Matthias Jakob and Holger Jakob—wish you lots of fun with our product!
